statements: SELECT * FROM court_reservations;
SELECT court_number, reservation_date, start_time, end_time FROM court_reservations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT court_number, reservation_date, start_time, end_time FROM court_reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2023-07-15';
SELECT id, court_number, reservation_date, user_id FROM court_reservations WHERE court_number = 2 ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT id, court_number, start_time, end_time FROM court_reservations WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT court_number, start_time, end_time FROM court_reservations WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM court_reservations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT id, court_number, reservation_date, start_time, end_time FROM court_reservations ORDER BY reservation_date, start_time;
SELECT id, user_id, reservation_date, start_time, end_time FROM court_reservations WHERE court_number IN (1, 3, 5) AND user_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY reservation_date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Court_Reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, start_time, end_time, court_number FROM Court_Reservations;
SELECT court_number, reservation_date, start_time, end_time, reservation_id FROM Court_Reservations;
SELECT available_date, is_available, court_number FROM Court_Availability;
SELECT * FROM Court_Availability WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Court_Reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-11-15';
SELECT reservation_id, start_time, end_time FROM Court_Reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT court_number, reservation_date FROM Court_Reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-12-01' AND reservation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Court_Availability WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT court_number, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM Court_Reservations GROUP BY court_number ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_reservations;
SELECT user_id, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM court_reservations WHERE court_id = 2;
SELECT court_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM court_reservations GROUP BY court_id;
SELECT DISTINCT court_id FROM court_reservations WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM court_availability WHERE available_hours > 3 AND max_capacity >= 10;
SELECT * FROM court_reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT court_id, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM court_reservations WHERE status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(reservation_id) AS total_reservations FROM court_reservations;
SELECT court_id, SUM(duration) AS total_duration FROM court_usage GROUP BY court_id ORDER BY total_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM court_reservations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM CourtReservation;
SELECT court_id, reservation_date, start_time FROM CourtReservation WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT user_id, reservation_date, start_time, end_time FROM CourtReservation WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00';
SELECT organization_name, address FROM FacilityOrganization;
SELECT * FROM CourtUsage WHERE date = '2022-10-20' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, court_id, reservation_date, start_time, end_time, user_id FROM CourtReservation;
SELECT court_id, available_date, available_start_time, available_end_time FROM CourtAvailability ORDER BY available_date DESC;
SELECT usage_id, court_id, user_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM CourtUsage WHERE user_id = 'abc123' ORDER BY date ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT organization_id, organization_name, address FROM FacilityOrganization WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' OR address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT * FROM CourtAvailability WHERE available_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM court_reservations
SELECT court_number, start_time, end_time FROM court_reservations WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM court_usage GROUP BY user_id
SELECT facility_name, location FROM court_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM court_reservations ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT court_number, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM court_reservations GROUP BY court_number HAVING reservation_count > 2;
SELECT c.court_number, c.available FROM court_availability c JOIN court_reservations r ON c.court_number = r.court_number WHERE r.start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND r.end_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT u.username, r.start_time, r.end_time FROM users u JOIN court_reservations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE u.phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT f.facility_name, SUM(u.time_slot) AS total_usage_time FROM court_facilities f JOIN court_usage u ON f.facility_id = u.court_number GROUP BY f.facility_name ORDER BY total_usage_time DESC;
